snippet: Instead of political bullying, Governor Cuomo should welcome a primary challenge from Zephyr Teachout and give New York State voters a choice.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New York Gov Andrew Cuomo for trying to throw Zephyr Teachout off the Democratic primary ballot for governor; contends Cuomo and his aides are bullying Teachout and calls on him to engage with Teachout as serious candidate.
lead_paragraph: Instead of political bullying, Governor Cuomo should welcome a primary challenge from Zephyr Teachout and give New York State voters a choice.

headline.seo: Gov. Cuomo Should Welcome Zephyr Teachout
